1.title: Weightless Wonders
1.plot: Longtime friends climb an eight-story raft wall in Mexico, gym buddies duke it out Down Under on an inflatable obstacle course and dancers drop like it's hot down a 70-foot slide in Arizona.

2.title: Empress Falls
2.plot: Zookeepers rappel down a massive 10-story waterfall in Australia, dancers flip upside-down a drop slide in Mexico and the Tampa Bay Storm cheerleading team hits a 50-foot raft wall in Florida.

3.title: Perfect Storm
3.plot: A water park first-timer flies through a 60-foot tornado in Australia, couples scream up and down the body of a giant snake in the jungles of Guatemala and friends flow down a slide that Mother Nature's been working on for eons.

4.title: Tidal Waves and Mermaids
4.plot: A couple hangs ten down twin drop slides in California, identical twins get swept away on a seven-story enclosed waterslide in Australia and newlyweds transform into mermaids in Florida.

5.title: Welcome to Splashtown
5.plot: Workout buddies pull themselves over the edge of one of the most terrifying freefall rides in Texas while gorgeous expats take a ride down the longest waterslide in Thailand; four friends surrender to the gods in Mexico.

6.title: Primal Fear
6.plot: Expats go primal at a dinosaur-themed water park in Thailand, four friends ride the beast in Indiana and international students experience the true power of a sonic shock wave in Texas.

7.title: Sweet Falls
7.plot: Newbie rafting guides take on class-5 rapids in West Virginia, basketball teammates brace themselves for the tallest and longest waterslides in Thailand and two sisters plummet down a 245-foot slide in Missouri.

8.title: Appalachian Splashin'
8.plot: Friends hydroplane down the tallest waterslide in Tennessee, riders nervously wait to free fall down a six-story trapdoor slide in Thailand and San Diego transplants muster up the courage to say "yes" to a 75-degree drop.

9.title: Shark-Inflated Waters
9.plot: Friends embrace the rage down the West Coast's only 100-foot-high mat racer, friendly adversaries race across an inflatable obstacle course in South Carolina and brothers plummet down a six-story trapdoor slide in Ohio.

10.title: Double-Dog Dare
10.plot: Models try not to scream down dueling 75-foot waterslides in Illinois, friends hit up the world's only retractable dome water park in Germany and four moms enjoy a day off on a water ride with six 300-foot-long tubes in Indiana.

11.title: Raging Rapids
11.plot: Couples raft down one of the best whitewater sections in the Rocky Mountains, childhood friends slide into the belly of the beast in Illinois and a couple of novices test out a 10-story trapdoor slide in North Carolina.

1.title: Getting Wet in Brazil
1.plot: Beach Park in Fortaleza, Brazil; Pump House Water Park in Jay Peak, Vermont; Blue Bayou Water Park in Baton Rouge, Louisiana; World Waterpark in Edmonton, Alberta.

2.title: Getting Wet in Phoenix
2.plot: Area 47 in Austria, Wet 'n Wild in Orlando, Holiday World in Indiana, and Wet 'n Wild in Phoenix.

3.title: Getting Wet in Germany
3.plot: Wilderness Resort in Wisconsin Dells, Wisconsin; NRH20 Family Water Park in North Richland Hills, Texas; Galaxy in Erding, Germany; Village Water Park in Barra do Piraí, Brazil.

4.title: Getting Wet in Italy
4.plot: Aqualandia near Venice, Italy; Schlitterbahn in New Braunfels, Texas; Noah's Ark in Wisconsin Dells, Wisconsin; Buena Vista Lodge & Adventure in Guanacaste, Costa Rica.

5.title: Getting Wet in Denver
5.plot: Tropical Islands Resort in Krausnick, Brandenburg, Germany; Zoombezi Bay near Columbus Ohio; Schlitterbahn in New Braunfels, Texas; Water World near Denver, Colorado.

6.title: Getting Wet in Jersey
6.plot: Aquatica in San Antonio, Texas; Mountain Creek Waterpark in Vernon, New Jersey; Splashin' Safari in Santa Claus, Indiana; Wave Die Wörgler Wasserwelt (Wave Water World) in Wörgl, Austria.

7.title: World's Best Rides
7.plot: This hour-long special is a countdown of 11 top water rides featured in earlier episodes.

1.title: Getting Wet in Vail
1.plot: Canevaworld near Verona, Italy; the Destroyer home-made water slide near Vail, Colorado; Hurricane Harbor in Jackson, New Jersey; Acroland in Tignes, France.

2.title: Getting Wet in the Canary Islands
2.plot: Siam Park in the Canary Islands; Water Country USA in Williamsburg, Virginia; U.S. National Whitewater Center in Charlotte, North Carolina; Baldi Hot Springs Resort in La Fortuna, Costa Rica.

3.title: Getting Wet in the Bahamas
3.plot: Prepare to scream as we plunge 7 stories into a cave in the Bahamas.

4.title: Getting Wet in the Backyard
4.plot: Blue Bayou Water Park in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, Splish Splash Water Park on Long Island, New York; Vandara Hot Springs and Adventure in Costa Rica; the home-made Slip 'n Soar in Augusta, Georgia.

5.title: Getting Wet in China
5.plot: Brace yourself for a 2G water slide in China that shoots riders upside down

6.title: Getting Wet in Maui
6.plot: We visit the Kohoma Ranch in Maui where the slides are homemade and wild.

7.title: Getting Wet in Abu Dhabi
7.plot: Hold on to your trunks as we take on the world's only speed slide.

8.title: Getting Wet in San Diego
8.plot: Check out a wave machine that lets you surf a monster curl standing up.

9.title: Getting Wet in Honolulu
9.plot: An American water slide takes riders on a 40-mile-an-hour flatline.

1.title: Building the World's Tallest
1.plot: This hour-long special details the design, testing, and construction of the 168 foot 7 inch tall Verrückt, the world's tallest water slide at Schlitterbahn water park in Kansas City, Kansas.

2.title: Getting Wet in the Jungle
2.plot: The world's tallest trap door slide at Aqualandia in Spain, a home-made slide in Minnesota that cost over $20,000, extreme water rides at Aquaventure in Dubai, and a remote slide in the jungle of Mexico.

3.title: Getting Wet in Summer Camp
3.plot: The 50 mile an hour loop in Switzerland that's the fastest on Earth; America's only ski ramp inspired slip and fly in Ohio; the $1.2 million dollar, 360-degree rush in Alabama and more.

4.title: Getting Wet in Cancun
4.plot: Check out the first trap door slide in the world that tortures six at a time in New England. Brave Poland's record-breaking eight-foot wide, 610 ft long, 41-second tube slide.

5.title: Getting Wet in Malaysia
5.plot: Hold tight, there's a 70-degree drop that's terrorizing the south. Wet your senses in the world's first 5D water ride experience inside a theater. And a 6-story slide blasts riders down in a heart-stopping 15 seconds.

6.title: World's Best II
6.plot: From a slide in Costa Rica atop a sleeping a volcano, to plunging 90-feet down a near vertical drop in Thailand, to the world's tallest and fastest waterside in Kansas - we're counting down the world's best rides.

1.title: Building the World's Longest
1.plot: Xtreme Waterparks is going halfway around the world for the exclusive story of the longest waterslide on Earth - stretching two thousand feet or nearly seven football fields in New Zealand.

2.title: Getting Wet in New Zealand
2.plot: We're going to New Zealand! Get ready to slip and slam down Mother Nature's Rere Rock. Then, plunge down the world's tallest trap-door slide in Kentucky. Next, we're off to Georgia's gravity-defying combination bowl & half-pipe.

3.title: Getting Wet in New Jersey
3.plot: We're at New Jersey's notorious Action Park on the world's tallest double looping slide! Piranhas await you at Brazil's infamous Natural Insano. Prepare for Argentina's twin-racing slide and Hawaii's big-air backyard slide!

4.title: America's Biggest Wave Pool
4.plot: Splash in USA's biggest wave pool in a town where water slides outnumber people! Get swept up in the world's very first water sphere in Turkey. Then, brace yourself for high drops and weightless verticals in Williamsburg!

5.title: Getting Wet in Fiji
5.plot: Hold tight, we're heading to Fiji! Ride down exotic slides deep in the island's remote rain forests, all while standing up. Next, head inside an extinct volcano for one of the tallest slides in South Africa.

6.title: Blowing Up the World's Longest in NJ
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Sliding with Sharks
1.plot: Take a voyage to experience a shark-infested slide in the Canary Islands, the first dueling Master Blasters in Phoenix, the world's longest thermal water slide in the Swiss Alps and the largest indoor water park in North America.

2.title: Getting Wet in Vegas
2.plot: Journey to the world-famous Brazilian legend literally named "Insane" in Fortaleza, a gigantic wave in the middle of the Nevada desert that's the world's first ride of its kind and Canada's latest homemade weapon with human ammo.

3.title: America's First Rattler
3.plot: Ride an urban legend slide in Poland, the tallest artificial waves in France, a serpentine slide in Vegas called The Rattler, and The Beast at a western themed park in Mallorca, Spain.

4.title: Tallest in America
4.plot: Surf a 180-degree wave in Brazil, check out the planet's only side-by-side dueling raft slide and ride down America's tallest twin body slide.

5.title: World's Largest Indoor Park
5.plot: Head to the world's largest indoor water park in Germany, the first near-vertical loop slide in the US, and a slide in France the locals call the "Crazy Jump".

6.title: Austria's Adult Playground
6.plot: Brace yourself for an adrenaline-filled adult playground in Austria, the tallest sheet waves in the world in southern France, and the tallest, steepest, and only triple trap door slide in America.

7.title: Getting Wet in Tenerife
7.plot: Travel to Waco, Texas, for the Royal Flush, Tenerife for Singha, a one-of-a-kind water coaster that's the fastest in the world, and Rio de Janeiro for the tallest body slide in the world named after Mount Kilimanjaro.

1.title: First Time Flyers
1.plot: Let loose at the world's first grownups-only water park in Mallorca, Spain, then head across the pond to Waco, TX, to ride BSR Cable Park's newest addition before catching some G's spinning though Beech Bend's Cyclone Saucers.

2.title: Texas Typhoon
2.plot: Ride through the belly of Aquaconda in Dubai before Typhoon Texas makes landfall in Katy, Texas. Then take in the views at the Citta del Mare Hotel as their toboggan to the sea drops you straight into the Mediterranean.

3.title: Rock Slide Ahead
3.plot: In the Netherlands, a rock band takes a break from their tour for water park fun before a group of gym rats head to Mother Nature's waterslide in Asheville, NC. Meanwhile the Kaleid-o-Slide brings a splash of color in Greece.

4.title: Twist and Launch
4.plot: In Italy, people tweet, post and like every video of Aqualandia's newest attraction. Back stateside, Turbo Twisters' pitch-black tubes keep riders guessing while surfing buddies check out the world's largest surf lagoon in Wales.

5.title: Shock and Awesome
5.plot: Speed is the name of the game on Velocity Peak in Athol, Idaho, while Blackbeard gets his revenge aboard Carowinds newest attraction. And things get down and dirty in Cork, Ireland, at the West Cork Secret mud slide.

6.title: Slip and Fly
6.plot: Riders take flight on Slip N Fly just off the beaches of Thailand, while thrill seekers experience manmade Class 4 rapids within Oklahoma City's limits. And a 56-foot drop slide has Norse warriors trembling in fear in Denmark.

7.title: Inflatable Adventures
7.plot: Friends try to catch their breath on one of Europe's tallest slides in Portugal, rafting guides check out a 25-foot inflatable iceberg in West Virginia and gym buddies defy gravity on the tallest water slide in the US.

8.title: Adrenaline on the Ocean
8.plot: Teachers slide into the world's biggest water sphere in Thailand while actors challenge one another to a race on a water slide atop the Carnival Sunshine. Then, friends get airborne thrills behind a speedboat in Greece.

9.title: Leap of Faith
9.plot: Roller derby teammates go for the gold in Utah, friends test their mettle walking with sharks in the Bahamas and a couple swings like Tarzan on a 34-foot floating adult playground in Texas.

10.title: Waterfalls and Free Falls
10.plot: Twins take on the planet's highest rafting challenge in New Zealand, while Ultimate Frisbee teammates in Miami reach ultimate speeds on the fastest waterslide at sea. Finally, two couples get messy on a date night in Tampa.

11.title: High Speed at Sea
11.plot: Brothers lose their mind on the Brain Drain in Florida, three friends uncover a hidden gem in the rainforest of Puerto Rico and cruise ship cast members check out the largest water park at sea.

12.title: Releasing the Kraken
12.plot: Adrenaline junkies pull some Gs in Thailand, face the Kraken in Australia and slide out the exit door of a 747 in Oregon.

13.title: Waterfalls and Wipeouts
13.plot: Friends raft down the world's largest man-made waterfall in New Zealand, young professionals take on The Challenge course in Thailand and newlyweds scream the whole way down a trapdoor slide with a 360-degree loop.

14.title: Mystic Mountain
14.plot: Friends say goodbye by going upside down on a six-story aqualoop tower in Australia. lifelong parkgoers take on a giant funnel in Brazil and three friends feel the rhythm and rhyme on a slide inspired by the Jamaican bobsled team.

15.title: Positively Glowing
15.plot: Friends visit the world's tallest inflatable slide in Australia, expats explore underground caves filled with glowworms in New Zealand and couples slide down a 100-foot waterfall in Brazil.

16.title: Prometheus
16.plot: Siblings tackle a crazy twisting ride with two head-spinning vortexes in Argentina, students bounce over inflatable water obstacles in Australia and friends tube down a hidden river deep in the jungle of Bali.

17.title: Smash Down in Brazil
17.plot: A husband-and-wife team take on an 85-foot trapdoor slide in Bali, a woman celebrates her birthday swimming with larger-than-life crocodiles in Australia and four friends fly down the most extreme rapids that Jamaica has to offer.

18.title: Slip Slidin' Away
18.plot: A teacher hits the vertical Boomerang in Indonesia, three friends surf a 100-foot waterfall in Brazil and gym buddies take on a six-story inflatable waterslide in Australia.

imdb.title: Xtreme Waterparks
plot: Series celebrates over-the top and fabulous water slides from the world's tallest slide in Rio De Janeiro, Brazil, to a high-speed gravity-defying water ride in Orlando, Florida.::Travel Channel
